title: Autofill Protection
body: I think they should really make a boost that gives autofill protection for a certain amount of days or games. I believe that it would be good so you could get the roles you want/are good at

replies.body:
you can get an autofill protection if you fill or play support. And if there was ever a pay option to avoid this, I'd 100% quit this game. 

Other options include, asking your teammates to switch if you can only play certain roles, if you get autofill with support playing soraka, or uninstalling.

Also a note, if you ask to switch, some people like me will begrudgingly switch roles with you, but if you threaten to feed if you don't get your role like a angry little 10 year old, you're going to get reported for being an asshat.

If you get autofilled or play Support you get a 3 game immunity. But sadly the 3 game counter includes dodged champion selects.

There was also talk somewhere about giving you autofill immunity if you que solo in flex

This could be equally resolved by having a selection somewhere that says something like "I understand that by refusing fill I will be given lower priority than people who do fill and this might result in longer queues" and then it naturally sort itself out. People who dont want to fill will face longer queue times, potentially never finding a game and might reconsider. 
Anyone who refuses to play the role they are filled to gets reported and a system is implemented to determine if they trolled by trying to bulldoze their way into mid or whatever role and if they feed when filled the system takes it very seriously. For instance if someone dies to mid turret before minions have even met the first time when they were filled to support that should be a very heavy indicator towards feeding.

Can't they just do a thing where you select which role you want to be in before the game then in the queue you can't join games where someone else wants to do your role eg I pick jungle then potato picks jungle too. Then we won't be put in the same team.
yeah, thats all you have to do, one game of fill or supp
so that boost it play a fill role or support.
No it protects you from autofill
